languages.text: {n}Нэми качает головой.{/n} "Измена ложноверцам — не измена. Мы всю жизнь слышим песнь Предка, так как кровь наша чиста. Мы несем освобождение".
{n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."
languages.original_text: {n}Нэми качает головой.{/n} "Измена ложноверцам — не измена. Мы всю жизнь слышим песнь Предка, так как кровь наша чиста. Мы несем освобождение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the song of the Ancestor throughout our entire lives, for our blood is pure. We bring liberation."
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}Nemi niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Traicionar a falsos creyentes no es traición alguna. Hemos escuchado la canción del Progenitor toda nuestra vida. Nuestra sangre es pura. Traemos la liberación».
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Traicionar a falsos creyentes no es traición alguna. Hemos escuchado la canción del Abuelo toda nuestra vida. Nuestra sangre es pura. Traemos la liberación».
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}ネミは首を横に振る。{/n}「偽りの信者を裏切ることは反逆ではない。サイアーの歌をずっと聞いてきた。私たちは純血なの。解放をもたらすんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."

traits.locale_text: {n}ネミは首を横に振る。{/n}「偽りの信者を裏切ることは反逆ではない。グランドファーザーの歌をずっと聞いてきた。私たちは純血なの。解放をもたらすんだ」
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}涅米摇了摇头。{/n}“我们只是背弃了虚伪的信仰，并没有背弃帝国。我们一生都在聆听族长的歌声。我们的血统无比纯洁，我们将带来解放。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."

traits.locale_text: {n}涅米摇了摇头。{/n}“我们只是背弃了虚伪的信徒，并没有背弃帝国。我们一生都在聆听祖父的歌声。我们的血统无比纯洁，我们将带来解放。”
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}Nemi schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Falsche Gläubige zu hintergehen, ist kein Verrat. Wir haben das Lied des Schöpfers unser ganzes Leben lang gehört. Unser Blut ist rein. Wir bringen die Befreiung."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Falsche Gläubige zu hintergehen, ist kein Verrat. Wir haben Großvaters Lied unser gesamtes Leben lang gehört. Unser Blut ist rein. Wir bringen die Befreiung."
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}Nemi secoue la tête.{/n} « Trahir des faux croyants n'est pas trahir. Toute notre vie, nous avons entendu le chant du Sire. Notre sang est pur. Nous apportons la libération. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi secoue la tête.{/n} « Trahir des faux croyants n'est pas trahir. Toute notre vie, nous avons entendu le chant du Père. Notre sang est pur. Nous apportons la libération. »
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: {n}Nemi başını sallıyor.{/n} "İnançsızlara ihanet, hainlik değildir. Bizler Efendi'nin şarkısını ömrümüz boyunca dinledik. Kanımız saf. Bizler özgürlük getiririz."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi shakes her head.{/n} "Betrayal of false believers is not treason. We have heard the Sire's song throughout our entire lives. Our blood is pure. We bring liberation."
